name: Beans With Guns(early build)
description:
This is an early version of a game im working on. Try it out before the full game comes out (hopefully) with a variety of different weapons and maps, each one with a specific theme. Fight through waves of beans that try to take you down and secure that crown (see what i did there =D)

REMEMBER to carefully use your bullets and don't waste them!

Controls: WASD-movement   SPACE-jump     R-reload     SHIFT-sprint      RIGHT CLICK-aim       LEFT CLICK-shoot
